name: Pickaxes
description: Used to mine stone blocks and ores.
ingredients: Sticks & Wooden Planks or Cobblestone or Iron Ingots or Gold Ingots or Diamonds

name: Axes
description: Used to chop wood blocks faster than by hand.
ingredients: Sticks & Wooden Planks or Cobblestone or Iron Ingots or Gold Ingots or Diamonds

name: Shovels
description: Used to dig sand, gravel, dirt, grass and snow faster than by hand.
ingredients: Sticks & Wooden Planks or Cobblestone or Iron Ingots or Gold Ingots or Diamonds

name: Hoes
description: Used to till dirt blocks in preparation for growing crops.
ingredients: Sticks & Wooden Planks or Cobblestone or Iron Ingots or Gold Ingots or Diamonds

name: Clock
description: Displays the time relative to the positions of the sun and moon.

name: Bucket
description: Used to transport water, lava and milk.

name: Shears
description: Used to collect wool from sheep and leaves from trees.
